characterDescription:
The Taker of Secrets is the alias by which Sja-anat is known. She is one of the Unmade, a mysterious group of odious spren on Roshar.
She speaks to Shallan shortly after Shallan enters the revel atop the Oathgate platform in Kholinar.
According to Shallan, Dalinar's visions mention her.

characterDetails.Notes: Brandon has confirmed that the Unmade are Splinters of Odium. Odium splintered himself and created the Unmade to be his influence on Roshar. It is through the Unmade that Odium may be able to influence people in how they think or act.
